Introduction

Luluz (Korean: 루루즈) was a three-member girl group under Zenith Media Contents. The group debuted on November 17, 2014 with the digital single "What Do You Think Of Me?". The group's name is a combination of words Lumen and Luz, both of which mean "Light". After member Loa left the group, the remaining two members joined WANNA.B, another group under Zenith Media Contents.
